verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
G
Therefore the redeemed
Of the Lord shall return,
And come with singing unto Zion,
And everlasting joy
Shall be upon their head.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
They shall obtain
Gladness and joy,
And sorrow and mourning
Shall flee away.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Therefore the redeemed
Of the Lord shall return,
And come with singing unto Zion,
And everlasting joy
Shall be upon their head.
